Package controller

package controller
  • Class
    Description
    GameController
    controller component, updates all the entities states, and requests the game view to render.
    GameController.GameState
    state of the game.
    GameKeyListener
    controller, extension of the input handler(handles the player key presses), this class adds the 'escape' key handling, by coordinating the game controller, game view and pause menu view in the GameKeyListener.keyPressed(KeyEvent)method.
    InputHandler
    controller, handles keyboard input processing for the Player and menu navigation.
    LeaderboardViewController
    controller of the LeaderboardView view and Leaderboard model.
    PauseMenuController
    controller of the pause menu, helps to process the pause menu navigation and coordinates the TitleScreenView and GameView.
    ResultScreenController
    controller of the result screen, handles enter key processing that allows the user to go back into the title screen.
    TitleScreenController
    controller of the TitleScreenView, game entry point.
    WhatsYourNameController
    controller of the WhatsYourNameView view.
